name: Lupin the 3rd: Treasure of the Sorcerer King
name_original: Lupin the 3rd: Treasure of the Sorcerer King
description: Fantastic heists, impossible escapes, and busty brunettes - all in a day's work for a thief. Lupin the Third: Treasure of the Sorcerer King puts you in control of Lupin, a cat-burglar with all the style and panache of a British spy. Use disguises, stealth and of course the loot, to solve puzzles, gather clues, and run from Interpol Inspector Zenigata as he chases you across every country. Will you reach the King's palace and its golden treasures? And watch out for the lovely Fujiko - she might steal more than your heart.
